suncertify.db
Interface URLyBirdDataManager

All Known Implementing Classes:
Data, DatabaseManager
public interface URLyBirdDataManager

This interface is designed to have added function required to manage the database smoothly.

Author:
Segun

Method Detail

commitData

void commitData()
                throws URLyBirdException
Saving the data held by the data cache ..i.e Map<> in the DatabaseManager back to the file/database

Throws:
URLyBirdException - - if any form of error occurs when saving data to the file/database

findMatchByHotelName

int[] findMatchByHotelName(java.lang.String criteria)
Breaking down the match using the unique keys choices. this finds match by Hotel Name

Parameters:
criteria - - String value of hotel name criteria to match
Returns:
- an array of record numbers that matches the given criteria

findMatchByHotelLocation

int[] findMatchByHotelLocation(java.lang.String criteria)
Breaking down the match using the unique keys choices. this finds match by Hotel Location

Parameters:
criteria - - String value of hotel location criteria to match
Returns:
- an array of record numbers that matches the given criteria

getLockCookieValueUsed

long getLockCookieValueUsed(int recNo)
                            throws RecordNotFoundException
Reads the lock cookie of the record in the database

Parameters:
recNo - - Integer value of record number to get its lock cookie value
Returns:
- long value of the lock cookie of the data row in the database
Throws:
RecordNotFoundException
